QuestData.Title: Clear!
QuestData.Description: Oh, the gnomanity!$B$BThe Pleasure-Bot 8000 broke before it could bring me a single Draenor truffle. It swam here and shorted its power fluctuator.$B$BAGAIN!$B$BI have power going to it, but it isn't enough to override the fluctuator.$B$BCould you get me the sacs from the electric eels in the lake? I think that would be just the ticket!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Zapper Sacs from Lakebottom Zappers in Talador.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the eel sacs?
QuestData.RewardText: Those look perfect! By all that is mechanical, this had better work.$B$BNow let's just insert these here...
